effect.scarlet_violet: If the user faints before it next acts, the move that fainted it will have its PP dropped to 0. End-of-turn damage does not trigger this effect.
effect.the_teal_mask: If the user faints before it next acts, the move that fainted it will have its PP dropped to 0. End-of-turn damage does not trigger this effect.
effect.the_indigo_disk: If the user faints before it next acts, the move that fainted it will have its PP dropped to 0. End-of-turn damage does not trigger this effect.
effect.legends_za: If the user faints before it next acts, the move that fainted it will have its PP dropped to 0. End-of-turn damage does not trigger this effect.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: If the user faints this turn, the PP of the move that fainted it drops to 0.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: If the user faints this turn, the PP of the move that fainted it drops to 0.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: If the user faints this turn, the PP of the move that fainted it drops to 0.
